original_text: I will cause the people of all nations to think that the people of Judah are disgusting. That will be because of the evil things that the king of Judah, Hezekiah's son, Manasseh, did in Jerusalem.’
korean_text: 유다 왕 히스기야의 아들 므낫세가 예루살렘에 행한 것으로 말미암아 내가 그들을 세계 여러 민족 가운데에 흩으리라

sentences.original_text: I will cause the people of all nations
to think that the people of Judah are disgusting
That will be because of the evil things
that the king of Judah, Hezekiah's son, Manasseh, did
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 왕 히스기야의 아들 므낫세가 행한
